name: Connection Lost (Jordan Han)
description:
Controls:

- Mouse Left Click: Send command to crew member.

Features:
  • Be the helpless captain of a slowly dying vessel and crew.
  • Stuck on the sidelines, at best you can be a guiding force for the last crew member who has to try and keep everything alive.
  • Potentially be completely ignored by your crew member depending on your reputation.
  • Watch as your crew member slowly loses themselves to fear.
Description:

You poor, poor, space-faring soul.

There really isn't much you can do, is there? Trapped inside a holo-closet that you will unfortunately never come out of, you are were the captain of this vessel. Now? Well, now it's turning into a floating junk pile.

Something has gone terribly wrong in this place. Goodness knows what. All you know is what little you can see inside of your closet. More specifically, what you can read on your puny little monitor. It used to belong to one of the janitors here. You have no idea what happened to them, but they're not coming back. You're sure of it.

As lonely as this all sounds, you do have one remaining solace. The last crew member you can contact. They are doing everything they can to keep the vessel running. A noble, if fruitless, task. But they can probably do with some guidance, right? After all, you used to lead here. Or... if only you could remember how you got trapped here in the first place. Maybe they don't want your guidance after all.

At least they know you're here. That's more than you were expecting.

This vessel is going down. It's inevitable. But maybe, just maybe, you can try to keep everything going for long enough to get help. Or, well, not really you. You don't have a choice.
